Meltwater | Cloud Engineer | USA - San Francisco, CA / Manchester, NH / potential remote

Our mission is to enable Meltwater’s Product and Engineering teams to accelerate delivery of their applications and services without thinking too much about infrastructure, including helping with their migration to AWS. We need another AWS passionate, creative, motivated, and knowledgeable person with amazing communication skills to help drive conversations with Meltwater Product and Engineering teams while really listening to their needs.

You’ll get to try out new shit AND deliver value for the organization!

Stuff we like:

* Terraform

* Drone.io

* Kubernetes

* Teamwork!

Please apply through https://emp.jobylon.com/jobs/22650-meltwater-product-enginee...
